attributes.action: set up an alert system for when children go missing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no actual warning system in this country for when children do go missing.  This has to stop as there are too many children that go missing by setting up an amber alert system which should not only cover the UK but also Europe

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "set up an alert system for when children go missing."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15824.asp

Prime Minister's Office
